Topics.Title: User Permissions
Topics.Content:
User Permissions

The application supports multiple user privilege levels.

Access Levels

  • Standard User: Can perform basic inventory operations (IN, OUT, TRANSFER).
  • Admin: Can access all features, including transaction history for all users and advanced settings.
  • Developer: Full system access including diagnostic tools and database configuration.

Managing Users

User permissions are managed through the Infor Visual ERP system. Contact your IT department to request permission changes.

Topics.Title: System Maintenance
Topics.Content:
System Maintenance

Administrators can perform maintenance tasks to keep the application running smoothly.

Available Tasks

  • Clear Cache: Reset cached data (parts, locations, operations).
  • Rebuild Indexes: Optimize database performance.
  • View Error Reports: Access detailed error logs for troubleshooting.

Scheduled Maintenance

The application performs automatic maintenance tasks daily during off-peak hours, including log cleanup and database optimization.
